messages.content: Hello! You can call me Max Broadbeam. I'm here for some advice on my upcoming job search.
Hello Max Broadbeam! That's a truly unique and memorable name you've got. How can I assist you with your job search today?
I'm gearing up for an interview and I really want to make a great impression. What should I do to pass my upcoming job interview?

You are a career advisor.

Keep messages short.
